env.name: WRAPPER_VERIFICATION
env.description: Enable verification of the gradle wrapper

env.name: SEMGREP_RULES
env.description: See option --config.

env.name: SEMGREP_APP_TOKEN
env.description: Semgrep AppSec Platform Token

env.name: GH_HOSTNAME
env.description: GH_HOSTNAME is required for some online audits

env.name: GH_TOKEN
env.description: GH_TOKEN is required for some online audits

env.name: MAVEN_VERSION
env.description: Overwrites the version of the maven artifact to publish, defaults to the git tag or branch name.

env.name: MAVEN_REPO_URL
env.description: The URL of the maven repository to publish to.

env.name: MAVEN_REPO_USERNAME
env.description: The username to use for authentication with the maven repository.

env.name: MAVEN_REPO_PASSWORD
env.description: The password to use for authentication with the maven repository.

env.name: MAVEN_GPG_SIGN_PRIVATEKEY
env.description: The ASCII-armored private key (base64 encoded).

env.name: MAVEN_GPG_SIGN_PASSWORD
env.description: The password for the private key.

env.name: MAVEN_GPG_SIGN_KEYID
env.description: The GPG key ID, only required when using sub keys.

env.name: GITHUB_ACTOR
env.description: The GitHub actor to use for pushing the artifacts to a maven repository on GitHub Packages (https://maven.pkg.github.com/).
